meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by adenoids.
meanings.sent1: Her adenoidal voice made her sound congested.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with an adenoidal condition.
meanings.sent3: The adenoidal teddy bear spoke in a funny, nasal tone.
meanings.sent4: The adenoidal sound of the trumpet echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The adenoidal smell of the flowers filled the garden.

meanings.definition: Having a nasal voice or tone due to enlarged adenoids.
meanings.sent1: He spoke in an adenoidal voice after his adenoids grew.
meanings.sent2: The adenoidal singer's voice was unique and recognizable.
meanings.sent3: The adenoidal cat meowed in a high-pitched tone.
meanings.sent4: Her adenoidal laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The adenoidal quality of his speech made him stand out in the crowd.
